title: Sen. Bob Menendez Seeks Hatch Act Probe of Mike Pompeo’s Trips to Kansas
text:
WASHINGTON—A senior Senate Democrat filed a complaint on Tuesday about Secretary of State Mike Pompeo’s repeated trips to Kansas, saying they warranted an investigation into whether he was engaging in political activity while traveling in an official capacity on taxpayer funds.

New Jersey Sen. Bob Menendez, the top Democrat on the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, submitted the complaint in a letter to the Office of Special Counsel calling for a review into Mr. Pompeo’s activities for potentially violating the Hatch Act.
